data.title: Mena Suvari was married in Vatican City
data.meta_description: Mena Suvari and her concert producer fiance, Simone Sestito, wed Saturday in a private church in Vatican City, People mag reports. “The ceremony was truly unique, and Mena looked breathtaking,” a guest told the magazine. “They are very much in love.” The couple, who have been engaged since 2008, hosted a reception after their ceremony. […]
data.text:
Mena Suvari and her concert producer fiance, Simone Sestito, wed Saturday in a private church in Vatican City, People mag reports. “The ceremony was truly unique, and Mena looked breathtaking,” a guest told the magazine. “They are very much in love.” The couple, who have been engaged since 2008, hosted a reception after their ceremony. The duo chose to have the ceremony in Italy because most of Sestito’s family lives there. Suvari, 31, and Sestito, 25, met at the Toronto Film Festival in 2007.

Originally Published: June 28, 2010 at 12:00 a.m.
